meta.description: Stuff and people to thank, for bringing you www.dear-charlote.com.

ross.p: This is a bunch of shout-outs, to stuff I've used in building this site and people who've helped, in no particular order.

content.p: This site is built using Takahē, a client-side framework I built, for some reason.
I'm grateful to Mark Turner, for providing an image of a shouting Puffin which I used to represent Charlotte, in her spirit-animal form.
Big thanks to the Blake's 7 YouTube channel, which allowed me to watch Blake's 7 for the first time since about 1999. The videos from their channel are embedded at the bottom of every episode.
I work with James and he once suggested a neat little solution to how to get a black outline around a CSS shape, which I used for the notes speech markThis is a note. He probably doesn't remember.

I've reused a few of the techniques I developed for my icons on this site - for example the Federation logo in the top left hand corner and all those little speech ticks. Basically I'll do whatever I can to avoid loading in an image, because I'm lazy.
Both the Blake's 7 subreddit and subreddit have kindly answered questions I had on various topics, improving this blog significantly. Or at the very least satisfying my curiosity.
Some software and services which have been useful:

ul.li: ... plus an antique version of Photoshop

content.p: I'm grateful to Your Loyal Subjects, for providing a heavy metal consultancy service, improving a so-called running joke about baddies being metal.

I set up this site without consulting Charlotte, using her as a sort of mental audience for my writing. To my delight, not only was she not freaked out by the site, but has agreed to help out with it too. Or at least store her accumulated 4th Doctor facts here, which amounts to much the same thing.
